gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm

Interface ConvertsMag

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtkinsonBoore_2006, Campbell_2003, FrankelEtAl_1996, SilvaEtAl_2002, TavakoliPezeshk_2005

    public interface ConvertsMag
    Implemented by ground motion models (GMMs) that perform a magnitude conversion prior to using the value.

    At present such conversions are restricted to the 7 ground motion models (GMMs) used for 2008 CEUS gridded seismicity sources. All are designed to work with Mw but the grid source magnitudes are presented as mb. Note that ToroEtAl_1997 provides mb specific coefficients and does not need to implement to this interface.

    Author:
    Peter Powers
    See Also:
    MagConverter, CeusMb, AtkinsonBoore_2006, Campbell_2003, FrankelEtAl_1996, SilvaEtAl_2002, TavakoliPezeshk_2005

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MagConverter converter()
      Returns a magnitude scale converter.
